main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration

Class ConfigurationIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.ConfigurationIO

  • public class ConfigurationIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads/Writes a GlobalConfigurationWrapper from/to a file using jackson ObjectMapper.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

    • Constructor Summary

      ConfigurationIO()

      • ConfigurationIO

        public ConfigurationIO()

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static GlobalConfiguration read(java.io.File fileToReadFrom)
        Reads a GlobalConfigurationWrapper object from the file fileToReadFrom. It then instantiates and returns a @link GlobalConfiguration}.
        Parameters:
        fileToReadFrom - File to read the GlobalConfiguration from.
        Returns:
        GlobalConfiguration from the file. null if no GlobalConfiguration could be read.
        See Also:
        GlobalConfiguration

      • write

        public static boolean write(java.io.File fileToWriteTo,
            GlobalConfiguration configuration)
        Writes a GlobalConfigurationWrapper object to the file fileToWriteTo.
        Parameters:
        fileToWriteTo - File in which to save the configuration.
        configuration - GlobalConfiguration to be saved.
        Returns:
        True if the save was successful, false otherwise.
